TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewCellStyle extends System.Object implements class System.ICloneable

summary.span: 表示应用到 控件中的各个单元格的格式设置和样式信息。

span.span: Represents the formatting and style information applied to individual cells within a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类可让你跨多个 单元格、行、列、行或列标题共享样式信息，从而避免了在单个单元格上设置样式属性的内存需求。The class lets you share style information across multiple cells, rows, columns, and row or column headers, avoiding the memory requirements of setting style properties on individual cells. 有关具有类型为的属性的类以及它们彼此之间的关系的详细信息 ，请参阅 [Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的单元格样式](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control)。For more information about classes that have a property of type and how they relate to each other, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示在多个对象上设置属性的效果 。The following code example demonstrates the effect of setting properties on multiple objects. 此示例 通过设置属性上的属性，设置中单元格的背景色 。This example sets the background color of cells in the by setting the property on the property. 由于在属性上设置了属性，因此在交替行上将重写背景色 。The background color is overridden on alternating rows because the property is set on the property. 该示例还 `Last Prepared` 通过设置 列的属性上的属性来确定名为的列中日期的格式 。The example also determines the format of dates in the column named `Last Prepared` by setting the property on the column's property. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo/CS/form1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo/VB/form1.vb#10)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将在参数中设置的属性值应用于 `dataGridViewCellStyle` 当前 。The method applies the values of the properties that are set in the `dataGridViewCellStyle` parameter to the current . 如果未在中设置属性 `dataGridViewCellStyle` ，则当前的属性将 保留其值。If a property is not set in `dataGridViewCellStyle`, the current retains its value of that property.

summary.span: 获取或设置用户在单元格中输入 null 值时保存到数据源的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value saved to the data source when the user enters a null value into a cell.

value.span: 当用户输入 null 单元格值时保存到数据源的值。

span.span: The value saved to the data source when the user specifies a null cell value.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户可以通过按 CTRL + 0 或键入属性的值，在单元格中输入空值 。The user can enter a null value into a cell by pressing CTRL+0 or by typing the value of the property. 当用户提交更改时，基础单元值将设置为属性的值 ; `null` 如果 为 ，并且单元格 为引用类型，则为。When the user commits the change, the underlying cell value is set to the value of the property or to `null` if is and the cell is a reference type. 以编程方式设置属性时不会发生此转换 。This conversion does not occur when you set the property programmatically. > [!NOTE] > 当 设置为或以外的值时，控件不会显示等于属性值的单元值的属性值 `null` 。The control does not display the property value for cell values equal to the property value when is set to a value other than or `null`. 在这种情况下，可以处理 事件以显示 属性值。In this case, you can handle the event to display the property value. 有关详细信息，请参阅本主题中的代码示例。For more information, see the code example in this topic. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性。The following code example illustrates the use of this property. 在此示例中， 事件处理程序在 单元格值等于时显示属性的值 。In this example, a event handler displays the value of the property when the cell value equals . [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc2#50](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc2/cs/misc2.cs#50)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc2#50](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc2/vb/misc2.vb#50)]

member this.Font : System.Drawing.Font with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置应用于 单元格的文本内容的字体。

span.span: Gets or sets the font applied to the textual content of a cell.
The applied to the cell text.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此属性更改应用于单元文本的字样样式。You can use this property to change the typeface styles applied to the cell text. 由于 是不可变的 (其属性是只读的) ，因此您只能通过为其分配新的或现有的来修改此属性 ; 您不能直接更改返回对象的属性。Because a is immutable (its properties are read-only), you can modify this property only by assigning a new or existing to it; you cannot alter the properties of the returned object directly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置列标题的字体。The following code example sets the font for column headers. 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到包含名为的的窗体中 `GridView1` ， `SetupUpDataGridView` 然后 `PopulateDataGridView` 从窗体的构造函数或方法中调用和方法 。To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a named `GridView1`, and then call the `SetupUpDataGridView` and `PopulateDataGridView` methods from the form's constructor or method. 确保所有事件都与其事件处理方法关联。Ensure all events are associated with their event-handling methods. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound/CPP/form1.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound/CS/form1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound/VB/form1.vb#5)]

summary.span: 获取或设置应用于 单元格的文本内容的格式字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets the format string applied to the textual content of a cell.

value.span: 指示单元格的值的格式的字符串。

span.span: A string that indicates the format of the cell value.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定如何将单元值的格式设置为字符串。The property specifies how cell values are formatted as strings. 有关详细信息，请参阅[类型格式设置](/dotnet/standard/base-types/formatting-types)。For more information, see [Formatting Types](/dotnet/standard/base-types/formatting-types). ## Examples 下面的代码示例 `Last Fixed` 通过设置 列的属性上的属性，将名为 "Month，year" 的列中的日期格式设置为 。The following code example sets the format of dates in the column named `Last Fixed` to "Month, year" by setting the property on the column's property. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo/CS/form1.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo/VB/form1.vb#20)]

summary.span: 获取指示是否已设置 属性的值。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the property has been set.

value.span: 如果 属性的值是默认值，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the value of the property is the default value; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性来确定是否 已显式设置属性，而无需存储其默认值进行比较。Use this property to determine whether the property has been explicitly set without having to store its default value for comparison. 这非常有用，因为 属性具有非空的默认值，这不同于大多数其他 属性，这些属性具有默认值 `null` ，例如、 或 。This is useful because the property has a non-empty default value, unlike most other properties, which have default values such as `null`, , or .

summary.span: 获取或设置与 或 的单元格值对应的 单元格显示值。

span.span: Gets or sets the cell display value corresponding to a cell value of or .

value.span: 用于指示单元格为 null 值的对象。

span.span: The object used to indicate a null value in a cell.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 具有此单元格样式的单元格的值为 或 `null` 或用户编辑单元格并按 CTRL + 0 时， 控件将显示 属性值。When a cell with this cell style has a value of or `null` or the user edits the cell and presses CTRL+0, the control displays the property value. 当用户编辑具有此单元格样式的单元格，或按 CTRL + 0 时，控件将单元值设置为属性的值， `null` 如果 为 ，则该单元格 为引用类型。When a user edits a cell with this cell style and enters the value of this property or presses CTRL+0, the control sets the cell value to the value of the property or to `null` if is and the cell is a reference type. 以编程方式设置属性时不会发生此转换 。This conversion does not occur when you set the property programmatically. > [!NOTE] > 当 设置为或以外的值时，控件不会显示等于属性值的单元值的属性值 `null` 。The control does not display the property value for cell values equal to the property value when is set to a value other than or `null`. 在这种情况下，可以处理 事件以显示 属性值。In this case, you can handle the event to display the property value. 有关详细信息，请参阅本主题中的代码示例。For more information, see the code example in this topic. 此属性采用任何对象，您可以使用该对象指定类型与单元格的显示类型相应的值。This property takes any object, which enables you to specify a value with a type appropriate to the display type of the cell. 例如，您可以将此属性设置为字符串值，供文本框单元或图像使用以供图像单元使用。For example, you can set this property to string values for use by text box cells or images for use by image cells. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性。The following code example illustrates the use of this property. 在此示例中， 事件处理程序在 单元格值等于时显示属性的值 。In this example, a event handler displays the value of the property when the cell value equals . [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc2#50](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc2/cs/misc2.cs#50)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc2#50](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc2/vb/misc2.vb#50)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::Padding Padding { System::Windows::Forms::Padding get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::Padding value); };
member this.Padding : System.Windows.Forms.Padding with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 的边缘和它的内容之间的距离。

span.span: Gets or sets the space between the edge of a and its content.

value.span: ，它表示 的边缘和它的内容之间的距离。

span.span: A that represents the space between the edge of a and its content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置 属性将影响的编辑控件的绘制位置 。Setting the property affects where the editing control of the is drawn. 例如，如果将设置 为，并且将设置为 值为10的 、、和属性，则 会在单元格的中间绘制单元格的内容，而在文本框边缘和单元格边缘之间绘制空间为10像素。For example, if you set on a to a that has a value of 10 for its , , , and properties, the content of the cell is drawn in the middle of the cell with a space of 10 pixels between the edges of the text box and the edges of the cell. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在 包含所有者描述行的控件中使用此属性。The following code example illustrates the use of this property in a control that contains owner-drawn rows. 每行显示的文本横跨常规单元格内容下的行的整个宽度。Each row displays text that spans the entire width of the row underneath the regular cell content. 属性用于为此文本提供额外空间。The property is used to provide the extra space for this text. 在此示例中，所需的额外高度存储在一个名为的常量中 `CUSTOM_CONTENT_HEIGHT` 。In the example, the extra height required is stored in a constant called `CUSTOM_CONTENT_HEIGHT`. 此代码示例摘自一个更大的示例。This code example is part of a larger example. 有关完整的示例，请参阅 [如何：自定义 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的行的外观](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid)。For the complete example, see [How to: Customize the Appearance of Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting/CS/datagridviewrowpainting.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting/VB/datagridviewrowpainting.vb#10)]

value.span: ，它表示选定单元格的背景色。

span.span: A that represents the background color of a selected cell.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在 主要用于显示的控件中使用此属性。The following code example illustrates the use of this property in a control intended primarily for display. 在此示例中，控件的可视外观是通过多种方式自定义的，并且控件配置为具有有限的交互功能。In this example, the visual appearance of the control is customized in several ways, and the control is configured for limited interactivity. 此示例是类概述中提供的一个更大示例的一部分 。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性通常应指定与属性进行对比的颜色 。The property typically should specify a color that contrasts with the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在 主要用于显示的控件中使用此属性。The following code example illustrates the use of this property in a control intended primarily for display. 在此示例中，控件的可视外观是通过多种方式自定义的，并且控件配置为具有有限的交互功能。In this example, the visual appearance of the control is customized in several ways, and the control is configured for limited interactivity. 此示例是类概述中提供的一个更大示例的一部分 。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当 单元格中的文本内容太长而不能放在单行中时，是将它换到下一行还是将它截断。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether textual content in a cell is wrapped to subsequent lines or truncated when it is too long to fit on a single line.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 为 包含文本的单元格，则单元格将在单个行上显示文本，并将所有嵌入的换行符作为 box 字符显示。If is for a cell that contains text, the cell displays the text on a single line, and displays any embedded newline characters as box characters. 如果 为 包含文本的单元格，则单元格将换行符显示为换行符，还会包装超出单元宽度的任何行。If is for a cell that contains text, the cell displays newline characters as line breaks, but also wraps any lines that exceed the width of the cell. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性。The following code example illustrates the use of this property. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#074](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#074)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#074](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#074)]
